proof.title: The Horizon
proof.description: there is horizon, which is an apparent line that separates earth from sky.

proof.title: The Shadow
proof.description: shadow falls in different sides of the earth are of different angle, from which its possible to measure the curvature of the globe.

proof.title: Other Planets and Stars
proof.description: all other planets and stars in visible space are round.

proof.title: Time zones
proof.description: the time is different at different places on earth.

proof.title: Non-Euclidean Geometry
proof.description: the geometry based on plane doesn't apply on big scale due to roundness of earth.

proof.title: Lunar Eclipse
proof.description: when a lunar eclipse occurs, its visible on the moon that the shadow of earth is curved.

proof.title: The Coriolis Effect
proof.description: freely moving phenomenons like floating water and hurricane winds are deflecting to the right on the north of the equator, while its reverse on the south of it.

proof.title: Position of Stars
proof.description: the stars on the sky look reverse in northern and southern hemispheres.

proof.title: Increasing Sight by Elevation
proof.description: you can see farther if you go higher. You'd be able to see the same distance no matter your elevation is if the Earth was flat.

proof.title: Real Life Footage
proof.description: many different space agencies worldwide took photos of earth independent from each other.

proof.title: Face of The Moon
proof.description: only one face of the moon is visible to every part of the earth, which is only explainable with the globe model.

proof.title: The Equinox
proof.description: the sun passes over the equator twice a year, resulting in direclty perpendicular shadows, which is only explainable with the globe model

proof.title: The Solstice
proof.description: the sun passes over the north and south poles twice a year, resulting in the longest days in the year, which is only explainable with the globe model

proof.title: The Seasons
proof.description: temperature changes on earth called seasons happen due to change of Earth's distance to sun, which is a result of Elliptical Earth Orbit, which requires globe Earth.

proof.title: The Elliptical Orbit
proof.description: the Earth is on an elliptical orbit which can be justified with laws of Keppler and many phenomeons like seasons, different timezones etc., that are only possible with the globe Earth model.

proof.title: The Grid Distortion
proof.description: Flat Earth map are distorted from focus to extremities of the plane depending on where is based for creation of the map, while there is no distortion problem on the globe model.
